channel.title: MoonSpell [Test Complete]
channel.description:
Testing is over
Have some work to do :cool:
Current Bugs/Flaws: ~Walk/Spells/Range through walls ~When you die you keep ur stuff unless skulled. ~Npcs dont attack back when maged. ~Level 99 everything is combat level 136 (Calculations need fixing) ~Calculations need fixing for combat hits ~Godspells without staff ~Ladders arent implemented ~Potions dont work for level 1 stat? ~Npcs arent aggressive (That are suppose to be) ~Flames of Guthix gives Saradomin Strike Spell ~Npcs have no drops (just bones) ~Level 3's can wield any item without having the proper level ~After killing npc, the npc walks 1 tile then dies/when catching the npc dies one tile away but bones show where your currently at? ~Login should have player appearance ~When wearing skirt you cant see your boots/feet ~After accepting duel players are teleported to eachother then engage in combat <-- not sure to keep or not ~Add bubbles for actions such as pickpocketing ~2 players can attack same npc <-- Pretty leet tbh ~Player dies they keep there items (unless skulled in wild) ~Shops arent implemented ~No Following
Personal Problems ~Word Censor is on ~Standing still time needs to be longer then 2 minutes or whatever time its at.

item.title: MoonSpell [Test Complete]
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:5, topic:331454”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=427832.msg3141755#msg3141755 date=1267629587]
Good job, and good luck. I still believe this can be a better substitution for RSCDv25 if developed correctly, was made by a professional.
[/quote]

1 thread per player is a overkill and I doubt it can beat rscdv25 if rscdv25 is set up correctly.
However I cant remember anyone testing this server, so he made this source for no reason? Time to put it to use.[/quote]

That’s just an opinion, Java is able to handle hundreds if not thousands of threads simultaneously if written correctly. You can’t say it can’t beat rscdv25 until you’ve compared them at the same development level. Uhh, he made it for a server he wrote (Protosscribe) then released it for anyone who wanted to continue developing it. Although since everyone thinks rscdv25 is the best to use (which is completely dumb), no one really cared to try.

Read full topic

item.title: MoonSpell [Test Complete]
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Testing is over

Have some work to do

Current Bugs/Flaws:
~Walk/Spells/Range through walls
~When you die you keep ur stuff unless skulled.
~Npcs dont attack back when maged.
~Level 99 everything is combat level 136 (Calculations need fixing)
~Calculations need fixing for combat hits
~Godspells without staff
~Ladders arent implemented
~Potions dont work for level 1 stat?
~Npcs arent aggressive (That are suppose to be)
~Flames of Guthix gives Saradomin Strike Spell
~Npcs have no drops (just bones)
~Level 3’s can wield any item without having the proper level
~After killing npc, the npc walks 1 tile then dies/when catching the npc dies one tile away but bones show where your currently at?
~Login should have player appearance
~When wearing skirt you cant see your boots/feet
~After accepting duel players are teleported to eachother then engage in combat <-- not sure to keep or not
~Add bubbles for actions such as pickpocketing
~2 players can attack same npc <-- Pretty leet tbh
~Player dies they keep there items (unless skulled in wild)
~Shops arent implemented
~No Following

Personal Problems
~Word Censor is on
~Standing still time needs to be longer then 2 minutes or whatever time its at.

Read full topic
